properties.title: Autruches Aventure
properties.abstract: Get to know the world of ostriches in a small village in the Franches-Montagnes. Visit the ostrich farm and discover this unusual and little-known bird. You can also «sleep on straw» here.
properties.description:
Visitors to Ostrich Adventures (Autruches Aventures) will discover an out-of-the-ordinary farm set amid the Jura Mountains. Discover the birds' eggs, watch them brooding and if you are lucky, you might even see an ostrich chick hatch! Ostriches of all ages are strolling around the parklands. Option for visits with an aperitif and a meal.
Joseph Noirjean, the owner of the site, also arranges walks to prospect for fossils.
properties.name: Jura Tourisme
